subject: Individual tests ok, problem in a suite
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve got a weird situation and can t figure out how to debug it. Perhaps someone has some advice? I have a class called HouseholdTest.  If I run this test
messageBody:
Hi,

I've got a weird situation and can't figure out how to debug it.
Perhaps someone has some advice?

I have a class called HouseholdTest. If I run this test by itself,
it's ok.

I also have a class suite called AgentsTestSuite which contains the
HouseholdTest. If I run this test, I get errors on one or two of the
methods; i.e rerunning the test over and over again sometimes gives
one error and sometimes two (always on the same methods). If I use
Rerun failed tests - Failures first, the test is ok in all
circumstances.

AgentsTestSuite is inside another suite called ModelTest. Running
this throws up errors on the same methods as above, plus another in a
different test suite (which again is ok by itself). Rerunning failed
tests first clears one of the methods in the HouseholdTest but that's
it.

What is going on here? I've spent quite a while debugging it but
can't seem to figure out where the snag is. Has anyone else
encountered something like this?

Thanks,
James
